name: Pacman - AfterDark
description:
This game was created for a class project. The assignment was to recreate an old arcade game and to add your own mechanics inside to make it unique. Then we had to present it. So I decided to remake PacMan, and I added a shield mechanic to protect the player, as well as a teleporting mechanic. I also made a new ghost that moves randomly across the screen. This is the first game I have made by myself, so I decided to put this on Itch to showcase my progress that I have made over the last few months. If you download, I hope you enjoy!

Music by:  bensound.com
